LoadCycles.MajorUhOhs: Initializing tiles, NPCs, items and recipes...

Cheats.GamemodeUnlockedWorldCheatDesc: Allows Journey characters to join non-Journey worlds and vice-versa.
Cheats.GodModeCheatDesc: Prevents your player from taking damage, suffering from the effects of debuffs, etc.
Cheats.JourneyModeCheatDesc: Gives non-Journey characters access to Journey-specific features (i.e. research).
Cheats.JourneySacrificesCheatDesc: Automatically unlocks all items in the item spawning menu (requires world/server re-log).
Cheats.MapTeleportCheatDesc: Allows you to right-click anywhere on a map to teleport.
Cheats.FullbrightCheatDesc: Lights up the entire world for your viewing.
Cheats.FullbrightDimOptionCheatDesc: Dimmer light if the max lighting is too bright.
Cheats.FullbrightLightQualityOptionCheatDesc: Lessens the amount of light shown for performance issues.
Cheats.NoMainMenuUIScalingCheatDesc: Not a cheat, but removes the forced UI scaling on the main menu.
Cheats.PlayerESPCheatDesc: Displays player name and how far away they are from you.
Cheats.PlayerESPTracerOptionCheatDesc: Draws a line to all players.
Cheats.PlayerESPExtraInfoOptionCheatDesc: Displays numerous extra stats, including HP, mana, defense, and teams.
Cheats.BestiaryForceUnlockCheatDesc: Unlocks and displays all bestiary information.
Cheats.InfiniteChestReachCheatDesc: Provides infinite chest reach. REQUIRED if you want to use bank cycling!
Cheats.AltRightClickDuplicationCheatDesc: Enables duplicating items in the inventory by right-clicking while in favoriting mode. Also hold control to make a stack of 2.1 billion.
Cheats.ToolGodCheatDesc: Enables a check that refreshes all the tools in your inventory and then overpowers the select few that shift-clicking would select periodically.
Cheats.RefillsCheatDesc: Enables a check that fills up the stacks of all favorited items in the inventory periodically.

CommandDescriptions.help: Gives helpful information, a list of commands, and more. Put in a command as the first argument to read about that command.
CommandDescriptions.i: Spawns an item in your cursor slot. The item will be automatically sent to your inventory if your inventory is closed.
CommandDescriptions.searchitems: Spawns an item in your cursor slot. The item will be automatically sent to your inventory if your inventory is closed.
CommandDescriptions.ri: Refreshes the item selected in the hotbar.
CommandDescriptions.ris: Refreshes all items in all inventories of the character.
CommandDescriptions.invclear: Turns all items that are not favorited in the inventory and all items in the Void inventory into air.
CommandDescriptions.toolgod: Toggles the Tool God Cheat in the Cheat Menu.
CommandDescriptions.setstacks2b: Sets the stack of all stackable items in the inventory and all the banks to 2147483647.
CommandDescriptions.setstackslegit: Limits the stack of all stackable items in the inventory and all the banks to their maxstacks.
CommandDescriptions.setmaxstacks2b: Sets the max stack of all items in the inventory and void to 2147483647.
CommandDescriptions.setmaxstackslegit: Sets the max stack of all items in the inventory and void to their default values.
CommandDescriptions.favoriteall: Favorites every item in the inventory.
CommandDescriptions.refills: Toggles the Favorited Item Refills Cheat in the Cheat Menu.
CommandDescriptions.torch: Gives the player a torch with an invalid torch ID, which can cause crashes on other clients and the server.
CommandDescriptions.unbreakable: Gives the player a stack of unbreakable dirt blocks that, when placed, are not rendered on any client.
